description:
As a user who has forgotten their password
  I want to be able to reset my password securely
  So that I can regain access to my account

steps.name: Given  I am on the forget password page
When  I enter valid email address "user@premiumbank.com"
And  I enter correct secret code "BANK1234"

statusDetails.message: Security code field should be displayed expected [true] but found [false]
statusDetails.trace:
java.lang.AssertionError: Security code field should be displayed expected [true] but found [false]
	at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:111)
	at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:1578)
	at org.testng.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:57)
	at stepdefinitions.web.UI_ForgetPasswordFunctionality_StepDefinition.i_enter_correct_secret_code(UI_ForgetPasswordFunctionality_StepDefinition.java:65)
	at ✽.I enter correct secret code "BANK1234"(file:///C:/Users/schapre/automation/AutomationFramework_Selenium_Java/src/test/resources/features/web/UI_ForgetPassword_Functionality.feature:114)

steps.name: And  I click on 'Verify Code' button
And  I enter valid new password "NewBank@456"
And  I enter same valid confirm password "NewBank@456"
And  I click on 'Reset Password' button
Then  I should see success message 'Password Changed. Your password has been updated successfully.'
And  I should see 'Return to Login' button displayed
